messages.content: ComfyUI-segformer_b2_clothes is fine-tuned on the ATR dataset for clothes segmentation but can also be used for human segmentation.
How can I install the ComfyUI-segformer_b2_clothes plugin?

To install ComfyUI-segformer_b2_clothes, you need to download it, rename it to 'comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes', install the requirements from the 'requirements.txt' file, and download the model from huggingface.co/mattmdjaga/segformer_b2_clothes.
Where can I find the model for ComfyUI-segformer_b2_clothes?
The model for ComfyUI-segformer_b2_clothes can be found at the following URL: https://huggingface.co/mattmdjaga/segformer_b2_clothes.
The 'requirements.txt' file contains a list of dependencies needed to run the ComfyUI-segformer_b2_clothes plugin.
